name: WaChat
description: Django-based chat application with WhatsApp integration

SECRET_KEY.description: Django secret key for cryptographic signing

ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: Comma-separated list of allowed hosts (will be auto-configured with your Heroku app domain)

CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of CSRF trusted origins (will be auto-configured with your Heroku app domain)

FACEBOOK_TOKEN.description: Facebook WhatsApp Business API access token

FACEBOOK_PHONE_NUMBER_ID.description: Facebook WhatsApp Business phone number ID

scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py migrate --noinput && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
